= Change Log =

Cordys BIRT Reporting connector change log

= Version 2.0 =

  * Revamped the connector for BOP 4.2
  * Rewritten with BIRT Runtime version 4.2, this no longer requires the engine home directory to be set. It is removed from service container configuration page. 
  * Now the BIRT Connector need not be in the same organization as the web service.
